android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_.description: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKA.info: Allows an application to request installing packages.
android.permission.REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKA.description: Malicious applications can use this to try and trick users into installing additional malicious packages.

android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.description: Allows application to expand or collapse the status bar.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

playstore_details.title: Video Downloader Pro - Download videos fast & free
playstore_details.description:
Video Downloader Pro also known as 🏆Nova Video Downloader🏆 is the best video downloader that allows you to download videos from social media and video websites into your device. It is  super fast 🚀 and 100% free.  
How to Use :
1. Browse video or social clips with built-in browser
2. Play the video you want to download
3. Click the download button to download videos
Done

Features:
- Free video downloader,  fastest video downloader , movie downloader and video saver.
- Easily download video from  Instagram/Facebook/Twitter/Vimeo/Tumblr/ DailyMotion videos, etc
- Search videos or browse videos with the built-in browser
- Auto detect video when you play videos
- Sniff videos very fast and correct.
- Support different resolutions for download
- All download formats supported,   MP3, M4A, MP4, M4V, MOV, AVI, WMV, M3U8, PDF, APK ,PNG, JPEG etc . It is a MP4 downloader and M3U8 downloader.
- Fastest video downloader, 3 times faster than other downloaders because of its Super Downloader Mode.
- Download videos in the background
- Download reminder and download notification to let you know the download status anytime 
- Download several videos at same time
- Full-featured download manager to pause, resume and remove downloads 
- Resume failed download
- Auto resume download when the network is available
- Full High Definition video download ( HD Video Download ) supported
- SD card supported
- Fast access to Bookmark, History and Most visited websites
- build-in file manager
- Play videos offline with the built-in video player

Nova Video Downloader auto detects videos on social media and other video websites and makes all videos downloadable. You can choose different video resolutions, size and formats for download. The great download manager allows you to manage your downloads,  download in the background with fast speed and download several files at the same time.  The build-in file manager saves the downloaded videos and you can watch them offline anytime and anywhere.

Super video downloader with video detect
With the help of automatic video detect, Nova Video Downloader makes all online videos downloadable.  It is a great download app, download tool and movie downloader.

Plenty of video websites and social media supported
Videos and media clip can be detected and downloaded from popular social media and video sites. It is the best free video download app to correctly sniff videos from different websites.

One-click download & easy to use
Download your favorite videos from any website with one tap. A powerful video downloader helping you download any media contents for free from social media websites. 
 
Up to 3X download speed boosting
Accelerate downloads speed about  300% with super download mode.  It  can greatly save your time and enjoy the videos fast than others. It is a super video downloader.

Download different video resolution
You can choose different video resolution and size to download. You can choose HD videos for better experience or choose low resolution videos to save data.

Support download videos from many websites
With Video Downloader Pro, You can download Facebook media clips, vimeo videos, dailymotion videos, instagram videos and Twitter videos, etc

Free video download app
Video Downloader Pro (also known as Nova Video download) is a free video download app. If you are looking for a video download app to download videos, media clips,  social clips or vimeo videos. you really need to try this free video download app. You can save videos and enjoy them offline or share to other media app.

Notes:
- Use Video Downloader Pro (also known as Nova Video Downloader) indicates you agree that you will not use it for copyright infringement or forgery
- This app is NOT a YouTube Downloader. You cannot download YouTube videos because of YouTube policies 

Follow our Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/novavideodownloader
